content: I'm posting to request some more eyes on this PR, since it now moves a few lemmas around between data.nat.modeq, data.zmod.basic, data.fin and data.nat.basic.
Basically I'm not sure whether more / less stuff should be moved to data.fin. It does seem weird to me that add_mod and mul_mod get separated.
I left a review. I think it would be good if mul_mod moves along with add_mod.
